name: NSCustomTouchBarItem
desc: A bar item that contains a responder of your choice, such as a view, a button, or a scrubber (an instance of the NSScrubber class).

items.name: var view: NSView
items.desc: The view displayed in the bar to represent this item.

items.name: var viewController: NSViewController?
items.desc: A view controller whose view is displayed in the bar to represent this item.

items.name: var customizationLabel: String!
items.desc: The user-visible string identifying this item during bar customization.
